Package manito.eft.interfaces

Class PinpadInput

  • java.lang.Object
    • manito.eft.interfaces.PinpadInput
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable
    public class PinpadInput
extends Object
implements Cloneable
    Entity class for holding details of an input request sent to the pinpad for the customer to respond to.

      Fields

    • Method Detail

      • getId

        public int getId()
        Get the identifier for the type of input required.

        Supported options: 

           PI_ODOMETER              mileage
   PI_VRN                   vehicle registration
        Returns:
        id

        public List<String> getChoices()
